Welcome to the Sofi Stadium House, Room # 4 of the 5 chic bedrooms we offer.
This private room and bathroom with keyless entry pad, is located in a boutique hotel style home, at fraction of the cost of a hotel room.
WALK TO SOFI STADIUM OR FORUM, SAVE $60-100 on PARKING.
Each room is cleaned with CDC/Covid approved methods, after each guest check out.
To view all of our rooms click on my Airbnb profile.

The space
Location and style, get ready to experience the best that Los Angeles has to offer.
Designed by an HGTV star, Sofi Stadium House was gutted and remodeled by one of top builders in Los Angeles. With its boutique hotel feel, you'll find the house spacious, comfortable and well designed. Enjoy fresh fruit from the citrus orchard, a glass of wine on either of the European style patios, or take a quick walk to Sofi Stadium or the Fabulous Forum. You're very close to LAX, in the center of the city, making it easy to get eve

Discover the best of Los Angeles, with this one-bedroom Mid-Wilshire apartment. It’ll be easy to simply show up and start living in this fashionably Blueground furnished apartment with its fully-equipped kitchen, exquisite living room, and our dedicated, on-the-ground support. (#LAX247)

The space
As with any Blueground apartment, you’ll find a thoughtfully designed space complete with beautiful furniture and a fully-equipped kitchen in this one-bedroom property. And, thanks to our superior quality mattresses, luxury linens, and towels, you can relax knowing you’ll always feel comfortably at home. When you’re ready for some fun, you can take in the Los Angeles vibes or bring the entertainment to you with the premium wireless speaker or smart TV. This apartment also offers in-floor laundry.


Amenities

Building amenities unique to this one-bedroom apartment include an on-site:

- 24/7 Security
- In-Floor Laundry

Experience Summer in this Beachside California Craftsman Home w/ huge private yard and ocean views! This Two story home exudes warmth and charm and is steps to the sand! All bedrooms upstairs. Master bedroom has balcony with ocean view. There is a fully equipped office with ocean views. Eat in cooks kitchen as well as a tv/den with all the latest technology. Childrens toys, beach chairs and towels included. Weekly housekeeping included in rental price. Perfect Summer Beach Rental.

A spacious, modern & clean 2BD/2BA set inside a charming & completely renovated building in DTLA. Close to EVERYTHING! It has all the essentials you'll need to make your visit in LA a comfy one! Within walking distance or a short drive to the Staples Center, LA Convention Center, and all of the best restaurants, bars, shops and galleries. Hands down, the best rooftop view of the skyline in DTLA! This building & loft is truly a gem! 2 bedrooms 2 full bathrooms Washer & Dryer in the unit Fresh clean towels and bath essentials provided. 1 45' Smart TV Kitchen essentials include coffee maker, appliances, dishes and pots & pans. Guests can access Rooftop from PH. There's a fire pit, BBQ grill and built in Bose speakers for your enjoyment. *Please inquire if parking is needed and we will accomodate 1 parking space for $15/night . *ONCE YOUR RESERVATION AND PARKING IS PAID, ALL DETAILS WILL BE PROVIDED IN CHECK-IN INSTRUCTIONS* *PETS* We welcome your furry guests for a small $25 fee. A cozy home away from home, this private Los Feliz (1 bedroom, 1 bath) getaway guest house (with stunning hillside views and sunsets) looks and feels like you're in the woods. Perfect place to relax, unwind, and chillax.

The space
A cozy home away from home, this private Los Feliz (1 bedroom, 1 bath) getaway guest house (with stunning hillside views and sunsets) looks and feels like you're in the woods.

Located in the hippest part of Los Angeles, it's 5-10 minutes away from an assortment of distinguished attractions. From the Greek Theater, the Hollywood sign and Griffith Observatory (which you can see from the private deck-terrace), to popular movie theaters, restaurants and bars of Silver Lake's Sunset Junction, this newly renovated 800-square foot gem offers you privacy, comfort, and solace.

Pristine Cliff May designed architectural gem, indoor-outdoor Brentwood canyon living. Rustic country landscape approx. 5 minutes from the beaches of Santa Monica. This 4 bedroom, 3 bath, contemporary ranch house has a gated driveway, complete privacy, and charming outdoor patios on all sides. 36 ft. pool with large attached spa. One of L.A.'s most beautiful streets for walking features a gorgeous equestrian facility and trailhead to a serene canyon hike.

The space
Radiant floor heating warms the house on chilly mornings. Walls of glass look out on mature trees as you live as one with nature. The expansive center courtyard is perfect for outdoor eating or lounging quietly poolside. Master suite features separate sitting room, walk-in closet and gorgeous oversized bath overlooking a private, enclosed garden. Chef's kitchen, exercise equipment, plentiful drawers and closets, pristine linens, towels for pool and beach, high speed wifi, Netflix/HBO/Amazon, children

Live in the most sought after place in Hollywood; Beachwood Canyon. Old Hollywood meets contemporary charm in your place you can call home. Hardwood floors throughout the unit. Step outside your front door for a perfect photo opportunity to snap photos in from of the Hollywood sign. Then take a stroll to the Beachwood cafe and market where you can rub elbows with the local celebrities. This place is not suitable for people who smoke as smoking is prohibited inside and outside .

The space
There is a shared laundry room for the building. This is a quiet building so no music or parties. Respect the neighbors. Please don't book if you are a smoker. Smoking is NOT allowed inside or outside.

Show up and start living from day one in Los Angeles with this bright two-bedroom Blueground apartment. You’ll love coming home to this thoughtfully furnished, beautifully designed, and fully-equipped Hancock Park home with stunning balcony views over the city. (#LAX406)

The space
As with any Blueground apartment, you’ll find a thoughtfully designed space complete with beautiful furniture and a fully-equipped kitchen in this two-bedroom property. And, thanks to our superior quality mattresses, luxury linens, and towels, you can relax knowing you’ll always feel comfortably at home. When you’re ready for some fun, you can take in the Los Angeles vibes or bring the entertainment to you with the premium wireless speaker or smart TV.

Guest room with Queen sized adjustable bed and ez chair. Full length mirror, makeup mirror, big closet & bathrobes for guests. Bottled water provided and mints on the pillows!

Come spend some time off in this beautiful and spacious home right in the middle of Koreatown, LA. This cozy home has all of the necessities that you need on your trip so that you would feel right at home. It is fully equipped with a full modern kitchen, AC units in the bedrooms, TV for your entertainment, washer/dryer inside the home, a gym that is accessible on the first floor, as well as a shared space outside where you can host small bbq's for you and your loved ones!

This hilltop chalet is in a quiet, rural, safe neighborhood (I have known my neighbors for almost 20 years.)
There's an organic farmers' market and a Trader Joe's in South Pasadena (10 minutes' drive) and a Whole Foods in Pasadena (10/15 minutes' drive.) There's a Ralph's (the equivalent of Kroger's) 10 minutes away.
Due to the Delta variant, masks are required in California stores.
The house is not accessible for disabled persons as the driveway is steep and uneven.

The space
The house is airy and bright with many windows around it. It's surrounded by vegetation and is quite private. The guest has immediate access to the room via the front door.
The house has a superb view from a large patio and a gazebo under pepper trees and jacaranda trees. It's on a dead-end street so no traffic and no noise from cars! You hardly see the neighbors at all. And it's super quiet at night--except for the occasional owl hoot or coyotes howling up the hill. :

Hollywood Hills Central Location. Walk to Hollywood, Restaurants, Shopping. 10 Min to Universal, Beverly Hills, Downtown. 30 min to beach, Disney, Mountains. 2 Hours to Santa Barbara, San Diego, Palm Springs. This Guest House is for families of 2-3 Adults and 2-4 Children. (4+ Adults are not permitted).

The space
Our Private Guest House is used by Entertainment Industry friends, and we also have limited availability for families to take advantage of a great experience and location to base their Southern California visit. We may charge xtra for weekends in high seasons, due to demand. There is an extra king size air mattress, if needed.

Guest access
Guests are welcome to use both decks adjacent to Guest House, and may also request access to bar area, grill, outside patios and pool / spa during their stay.

Other things to note
Stair access only. This is not wheelchair easy access, or health-problem easy access, so

It's a private guest suite located in a residential single family home community where you'll hear quiet nights and the morning birds sing. It's centrally located and approx. 30-45 mins. by car in any direction to tourist attractions. If you're looking for a convenient, cozy and clean homeshare this is the place! Smoking is allowed only outside, there's ample street parking and host and guest share backyard patio.

蒙特利公园时代广场高级豪华公寓(整套豪华大套房)，一所迷人而又典雅的住宅。拥有宽敞明亮的大客厅，复古三角大钢琴，整个空间具有浓浓的艺术气息，时尚而又雅致。全新高端家具和床上用品，整洁、舒适而又干净，即可拎包入住。房屋内有洗衣机、烘干机；厨房内装有纯净虑水设备，可直接饮用，方便卫生健康。本公寓坐落在著名的华人社区，生活出行非常方便。休闲、购物、娱乐、电影院、健身、游泳、美食、医院、华人超市、西人超市等均在几分钟的步行路程。非常适合商务、度假、待产的客人。欢迎爱干净、无不良嗜好者、不抽烟、不携宠物的租客。公寓还提供24小时安全保卫。


在疫情期间，我们将特别安排出可以“自由出入、干净卫生”的住房。
房源基础要求为：保证房客可正常出入小区；支持自助入住；房源整洁度评分 ≥ 4.8 分；每次清洁都会使用专业医院级别的紫外线消毒；并且所有家具及把手都进行严格的消毒杀菌处理；床上用品和浴巾都会用消毒水杀菌及高温清洗并烘干，严格保证物品的安全性。

我们希望房客能感觉如同在家里一样舒适自在，但同时又能感觉自己已远离固有的生活，在这里彻底地放松身心——就如同身处一个处处为客人着想的精品酒店里一样。

我们还尽力确保随时供应新鲜的绿植和鲜花，让宾客能够爱上这里并能宾至而归。

如果有机会接待某位房客，我会为他们详尽地介绍房间、周边的环境以及在本地区游览的建议。
House Rules and Pool Guidelines

This is a drug free environment and no smoking or marijuana or vaping allowed anywhere on premise.
No partying allowed.
Noise curfew starts at 10pm.

Pool guidelines during Covid
• Advance reservation is required
• Only guests staying in premise is allowed and no outside guests.

Location, location, location! Moments from the infamous Chateau Marmont winding through one of the most exclusive celebrity enclaves in L.A. The space

There is a 400 MBs per second internet connection to the house. The guest suite has a strong WiFi connection. You should have no trouble working here on video conferencing software such as Zoom or Google Meet. We regularly have four adults working remotely without a problem.

该房源在疫情期间，都会保持一定时间的空置期。客人退房后清洁前，将所有窗户打开通风，再进行整屋的紫外线和臭氧消毒，然后开始深层清洁的工作。所有的开关、门把手等高频触摸表面上喷洒化学消毒剂。家具和洁具同样都会用酒精和消毒液进行消毒并清洁。被子、被套、床单、浴巾、毛巾和枕头都会杀菌消毒并清洗，再高温烘干。清洁、消毒工作非常得彻底，完全可以保证您在这里居住的卫生要求。在居住期间，我们还将为您提供全新的拖鞋、牙膏、牙刷，一次性的毛巾，一次性纸巾、消毒洗手液和洗手皂。
